TopicTitle: I need your help! Square Crew Habitat. Does it exist?

Articles.Content:
A square / rectangular hitchiker can.

I'm trying to get a square shaped project going, and I'm currently doing this one all stock. However, the one part that would really make it all come together would be a square~ish hitchhiker can. Do they exist? I can't seem to find it. I don't need a million parts or a thousand extra engines. Just a nice little habitat for Kerbals to live that isn't of the round variety.

Anyone know where to find one?
Use structural panels to make a hithchiker look square, I don't know of any mods for one though.

LLL is a mod that might suit you.

Careful which parts you prune away though, some share models.

Yes, Lack Luster Labs has A LOT of rectangle and square parts, windowed walkways, Habitats included.

Edited February 7, 2014 by Fett2oo5

I'll look at Lack Luster Labs stuff. Seems like more than a million parts or so. More than I'll ever need, or even want. I kind of like keeping it mostly stock, simply as a measuring stick so I can see how my progress compares to everyone else. I steal ideas from a lot of people that way, too. Maybe I can just keep one or two parts and discard the rest.

Any other tips out there?
Well you can always DL a mod, install it, then go through the part files and delete the ones you don't want.
